mapper.select: SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_CD, -- COMPLEX CODE CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX_S_NM, -- COMPLEX SUB NAME LATI_POS, LONG_POS, UNIT_CNT, -- 개수 ADDR, ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 ADDR1, ADDR2, LOC1_NM, LOC2_NM, LOC3_NM, POST_NO, IMG_SRC, MAP_SRC, LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- LOGO IMAGE SOURCE MNL_SRC -- ?? FROM COMPLEX_M ;

SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_CD, -- COMPLEX CODE CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX_S_NM, -- COMPLEX SUB NAME LATI_POS, LONG_POS, UNIT_CNT, -- 개수 ADDR, ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 ADDR1, ADDR2, LOC1_NM, LOC2_NM, LOC3_NM, POST_NO, IMG_SRC, MAP_SRC, LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- LOGO IMAGE SOURCE MNL_SRC -- ?? FROM COMPLEX_M WHERE CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} ;

SELECT COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID, '' AS CMPLX_GRP, COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME COMPLEX_M.ADDR, -- 일반 주소 COMPLEX_M.ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 COMPLEX_M.ADDR1, COMPLEX_M.ADDR2, COMPLEX_M_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC, -- CommonLife's Map Src/Url COMPLEX_M_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC -- CommonLife's LOGO Image Source FROM COMPLEX_M LEFT JOIN -- TODO: 확장테이블인 COMPLEX_M_EXT의 레코드가 없기 때문에 임시로 LEFT JOIN 함 COMPLEX_M_EXT ON COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID = COMPLEX_M_EXT.CMPLX_ID ORDER BY COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_NM ASC ;
